DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Venous Thromboembolism Prevention High-Risk Trauma Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study determine AT-III serum concentration differ patient normal ( > = 0.1 IU/mL ) versus subtherapeutic ( < 0.1 IU/mL ) anti-Xa trough concentration place enoxaparin 30 mg twice daily venous thromboembolism ( VTE ) prophylaxis . Secondarily , study compare two enoxaparin dose strategy : standard 30 mg twice daily dose strategy base trough anti-Xa value high-risk trauma patient . Specific aim include : 1 ) compare extent reduce AT-III activity patient trough anti-Xa > = 0.1 IU/mL < 0.1 IU/mL upon initial assay ; 2 ) determine proportion patient reach goal anti-Xa time goal anti-Xa achievement two interventional dose strategy : enoxaparin 40 mg every 12 hour ( consideration increase 50 mg every 12 hour recheck anti-Xa goal ) enoxaparin 30 mg every eight hour ; 3 ) compare anti-Xa enoxaparin dose strategy base VTE , bleed rate , transfusion requirement , drug discontinuation rate bioaccumulation , 4 ) determine patient-specific factor correlate subtherapeutic anti-Xa serial AT-III activity , weight , body mass index , age , cumulative fluid administration , thromboelastography ( TEG ) .
DOC.criteria: Multisystem trauma Anticipated length stay least 72 hour At high risk ( risk adjustment profile [ RAP ] > = 5 ) initiate enoxaparin 30 mg every 12 hour per VTE prophylaxis protocol No counterindication trauma team VTE prophylaxis protocol ( e.g. , intracranial bleeding , incomplete spinal cord injury hematoma within 24 hour post injury , ongoing hemorrhage , uncorrected coagulopathy , > = grade IV liver spleen injury , intraocular injury ) Renal dysfunction ( creatinine clearance < 30 mL/min continuous renal replacement therapy ) Weight < 50 kg > 150 kg Platelet count < 50,000 Allergy heparin low molecular weight heparin On therapeutic anticoagulation admission require within 24 hour admission Isolated intracranial hemorrhage Known hyperbilirubinemia ( serum bilirubin > 6.6 mg/dL ) Pregnancy Incarceration
